original_text: If they want to inquire about something, they should ask their own husbands at home; for it is disgraceful for a woman to speak in the church.
korean_text: 만일 무엇을 배우려거든 집에서 자기 남편에게 물을지니 여자가 교회에서 말하는 것은 부끄러운 것이라

sentences.original_text: If they want to inquire about something
they should ask their own husbands at home
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 집에서 자기 남편들에게 물어야 한다

sentences.original_text: for a woman to speak in the church
